items.title: Real-time Task Updates
items.description: Enable team members to see task changes instantly across all devices.
acceptance_criteria: When a task is updated by one user, all other users see the change within 2 seconds.
Task status, assignee, and due date changes are reflected without requiring a page refresh.
non_functional: System latency for updates must be under 2 seconds.
Support at least 100 concurrent users without performance degradation.

items.title: Shared Project Boards
items.description: Allow teams to organize tasks into shared boards accessible by all members.
acceptance_criteria: Users can create a board and invite team members via email.
All invited members can view and edit tasks on the board.
non_functional: Board load time must be under 3 seconds.
Data consistency maintained across all user sessions.

notes: The requirement is high-level and lacks details on specific collaboration features (e.g., chat, file sharing). Assumptions made for core collaboration features include real-time updates and shared boards.
